title: A Short Life of Abraham Lincoln
creator: John George Nicolay
description:
LibriVox recording of A Short Life of Abraham Lincoln, by John G. Nicolay. John G. Nicolay was Abraham Lincoln’s private White House secretary. With assistant secretary, John Hay, he wrote the two volume definitive biography of Lincoln, "Abraham Lincoln, a Biography." Although this is a condensation by Nicolay of that biography, it is still a sizable work and a fairly thorough treatment of the life of the 16th president of the United States. (Summary by John Lieder) M4B audiobook of complete book For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
A Short Life of Abraham Lincoln CD cover Album Art
subject: history; biography; Civil War; United States; presidents; Librivox; audiobook
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
